detail_desc: Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and narrow sides with metal decorations.
Fully lined 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Cap with a reversible sequin motif on the front, covered button on top and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Lightly padded sweatband.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow on the shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, calf-length legs.
Socks in spotted mesh with elasticated tops.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped trims.
Trousers in airy linen. Relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a fake back pocket, and gently tapered legs.
Skirt in shimmering metallic jersey with a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front and back pockets.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a sheen, with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Knee-length dress in a rib knit containing glittery threads with a V-neck, detachable tie belt under the bust, and long sleeves.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Leather ankle boots with a decorative welt seam round the soles, lacing at the front and a visible zip at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 11 cm.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a text print on the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Matt tights with an elasticated waist and extra space for a growing tummy. 100 denier.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Padded front and back sections, zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and inset side panels in sturdy jersey lined with thermal fleece. Longer and rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Short, high-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with twisted seams at the front and decorative lacing on one side. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.

Playsuit in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, an opening down the back and button at the back of the neck. Pompoms around the armholes, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Long coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, long raglan sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Narrow acrylic Alice bands in various colours. Two patterned and one in a solid colour.

Soft, non-wired triangle bra in lace with decorative straps at the front and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow elastic hem with a fastening at the back.
Relaxed-fit chinos in an airy stretch cotton twill with a regular waist and a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and gently tapered legs.
Linen scarf with raw edges and short fringe trims on the short sides.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top and a magnetic fastener and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size 28x43 cm.
Skirt in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and patch front pockets.
Elasticated scrunchies in woven fabric with a knot detail.

Short, straight-cut tunic in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in a patterned weave with a collar, long raglan sleeves, press-studs down the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly and buttons. Front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slightly shorter, boxy-style jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jersey top with an open back that ties at the back of the hem.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey maxi dress with a V-neck, long sleeves and a high slit at the front.
Fully lined, lightly padded bikini top with a large decorative bow on the front, silicone trim at the top and side support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Mesh inner shorts.
Long earrings with metal and plastic rings. Length 7.5 cm.

Ankle-length chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit – a fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, a metal fastener at the back, ties at the back of the neck and a bow at the front.
Trousers in soft, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
V-neck jumpsuit in soft jersey with short sleeves and a zip at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Shorts in stretch twill with shimmering side stripes, a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Cargo trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and flap leg pockets with a press-stud. Decorative stitching at the knees.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Relaxed-fit polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and top and reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Knee-length kaftan in sequined mesh with a V-neck and short sleeves. Lined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Oversized jumper in a soft, chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slits at the hems.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend. Relaxed fit with a low-cut back that has decorative gathers around the edge, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Skirt in soft, washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved tops in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leather boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with bows, and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
